div.head: Citations Examples: How to Reference our Site and Sources

head.hi: How to Reference this Lewis and Clark Website

row.cell: APA

University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. (2005, March). The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Retrieved October 5, 2005, from http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/

Chicago/
Note
1. University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu.

Chicago/
Bibliography
University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu.
MLA
The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. 2005. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 5 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu>.

head.hi: How to Cite an Article under Additional Texts

row.cell: APA

Moulton, G. (1985). The Missing Journals of Meriwether Lewis. Montana: The Magazine of Western History, 35, 28-39. Retrieved Oct. 1, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?=missing

Chicago/
Note

1. Gary Moulton, "The Missing Journals of Meriwether Lewis," in Montana: The Magazine of Western History35 (1985); from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?=missing.

Chicago/
Bibliography

Moulton, Gary, "The Missing Journals of Meriwether Lewis," in Montana: The Magazine of Western History35 (Summer 1985). From the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?=missing.
MLA

Moulton, Gary. "The Missing Journals of Meriwether Lewis." Montana: The Magazine of Western History35 (1985): 28-39. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. 2005. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 5 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?=missing>.

head.hi: How to Cite a Particular Entry from the Online Journals

row.cell: APA

Lewis, M., Clark, W., and Members of the Corps of Discovery. (2002). September 4, 1806. In G. Moulton (Ed.), The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press. Retrieved Oct. 1, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?id=1806-09-04

Chicago/
Note

1. Meriwether Lewis, William Clark, et al., September 4, 1806 entry in The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, ed. Gary Moulton (Lincoln, NE: University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, 2005), http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?id=1806-09-04

Chicago/
Bibliography

Lewis, Meriwether, Clark, William, et al. September 4, 1806 entry in The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, ed. Gary Moulton. Lincoln, NE: University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, 2005. http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?id=1806-09-04.
MLA

Lewis, Meriwether, Clark, William, et al. September 4, 1806. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Ed. Gary Moulton. Lincoln: U of Nebraska Press, 2002. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. 2005. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 5 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/journals.php?id=1806-09-04>.

head.hi: How to Cite an Online Book, such as the Journals Themselves

row.cell: APA

Lewis, M., Clark, W., and Members of the Corps of Discovery. (2002). The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition(G. Moulton, Ed.). Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press. Retrieved Oct. 1, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclark journals.unl.edu/

Chicago/
Note

1. Meriwether Lewis, William Clark, et al., The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, ed. Gary Moulton (Lincoln, NE: University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, 2005), http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu.

Chicago/
Bibliography

Lewis, Meriwether, Clark, William, et al. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, ed. Gary Moulton. Lincoln, NE: University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, 2005. http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu.
Additional Example: Citation with Prior Publication Information

1. Paul A. Johnsgard, Lewis and Clark on the Great Plains(Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press / Center for Great Plains Studies, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, 2003); from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu2/lc.johnsgard.01.html.

Johnsgard, Paul A. Lewis and Clark on the Great Plains. Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press / Center for Great Plains Studies, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, 2003. From the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu2/lc.johnsgard.01.html.
MLA

Lewis, Meriwether, Clark, William, et al. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Ed. Gary Moulton. Lincoln: U of Nebraska Press, 2002. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. 2005. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 5 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu>.

head.hi: How to Cite a Sound Recording of a Book Excerpt

row.cell: APA

White, G. (Speaker). (2004). Second Excerpt (online audio file). In Salish Pend d'Oreille Culture Committee and Elders Cultural Advisory Council, Confederated Salish and Kootenai Tribes, The Salish People and the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press. Retrieved Oct. 5, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/audio.html

Chicago/
Note

1. Salish Pend d'Oreille Culture Committee and Elders Cultural Advisory Council, Confederated Salish and Kootenai Tribes, Second Excerpt of The Salish People and the Lewis and Clark Expedition, read by Germaine White; from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, SWF http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/audio.html.

Chicago/
Bibliography

Salish Pend d'Oreille Culture Committee and Elders Cultural Advisory Council, Confederated Salish and Kootenai Tribes. Second Excerpt of The Salish People and the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Read by Germaine White. From the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. SWF, http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/audio.html.
MLA

Salish Pend d'Oreille Culture Committee and Elders Cultural Advisory Council, Confederated Salish and Kootenai Tribes. Second Excerpt. The Salish People and the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Read by Germaine White. Online Audio File. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 10 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/audio.html>.

head.hi: How to Reference an Online Image

row.cell: APA

Peale, C. W. (c.a. 1807). Portrait of Meriwether Lewis(JPEG). Retrieved October 5, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/images1.html

Chicago/
Note

1. Charles Willson Peale. Portrait of Meriwether Lewis(ca 1807-08), from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, JPEG http://lewisandclarkjournals/images1.html.

Chicago/
Bibliography

Peale, Charles Willson. Portrait of Meriwether Lewis. ca 1807-08. From the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. JPEG, http://lewisandclark journals/images1.html.
MLA

Peale, Charles Willson. Portrait of Meriwether Lewis. ca 1807-08. Independence Historic Park, Pennsylvania. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 10 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/images1.html>.

head.hi: How to Reference an Online Video File of an Interview

row.cell: APA

Moulton, G. (Speaker). (2003). Second Excerpt. Interview with the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Office of University Communications (video recording). Retrieved Oct. 1, 2005, from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition web site: http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/video.html

Chicago/
Note

1. Gary Moulton, Second Excerpt of the interview by the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Office of University Communications, 2003; from the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, MOV http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/video.html.

Chicago/
Bibliography

Moulton, Gary. Second Excerpt of the interview by the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Office of University Communications, 2003. From the University of Nebraska Press / University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center, The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. MOV, http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/video.html.
MLA

Moulton, Gary. Interview with the U of Nebraska-Lincoln Office of University Communications. Second Excerpt. MOV file. The Journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition. 2003. U of Nebraska Press / U of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries-Electronic Text Center. 5 Oct. 2005 <http://lewisandclarkjournals.unl.edu/video.html>.
